alert.note: Alert for Haskell; Jones; Shackelford; Taylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 04 at 12:51PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Haskell, eastern Jones, northwestern Shackelford and north central Taylor Counties through 130 PM CDT... At 1250 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Stith, or near Tye, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Abilene, Merkel, Tye, Hawley, Lueders, Nugent, Avoca, Dyess Afb, Impact, Funston, Lake Fort Phantom Hill, The Intersection Of Us- 180 And Farm Road 600, Hodges, Big Country Baptist Assembly, Stith and Truby. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 266 and 285. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
